content.text: Hi, I am from California and I like to go to websites that have archery tips and tricks. What do you like to do?
Hi, I am from Oregon and I grew up on my family's farm. I learned to love the land and the outdoors.
That is so cool! I would love to live on a farm one day. What is your favorite thing about the land?
I love the fresh air and the open space. I also love being able to grow my own food.
That is awesome! I am a bit of a city slicker, so I would love to experience that.
I am sure you would love it! It is a lot of work, but it is also very rewarding.
I would be happy to help out! I am sure I would learn a lot.
You are welcome to come visit anytime! I would be happy to show you around.
I would love that! I will have to plan a trip soon.
Great! I look forward to it.
